00027 //----------------------------------------------------------
00028 GrKFAnim::GrKFAnim( const tstring& name, const UFastArray< URef< GrKFAnimData > >& kfData, float blendWeight, float speed )
00029 : GrAnim( name, blendWeight, speed )
00030 , _interpolators( 0 )
00031 , _interpolatorCount( kfData.GetElemCount() )
00032 , _duration( 0.0f )
00033 , _time( 0.0f )
00034 , _clamp( false )
00035 {
00037         _interpolators = new GrKFInterpolator[ _interpolatorCount ];
00038         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00039                 _interpolators[ i ] = GrKFInterpolator( kfData[ i ] );
00040         CalcDuration();
00041 }
00042 
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------
00044 GrKFAnim::GrKFAnim( UReader& reader )
00045 : GrAnim( "" )
00046 , _interpolators( 0 )
00047 , _interpolatorCount( 0 )
00048 , _duration( 0.0f )
00049 , _time( 0.0f )
00050 , _clamp( false )
00051 {
00052         Load( reader );
00053 }
00054 
00055 //----------------------------------------------------------
00056 GrKFAnim::GrKFAnim( const tstring& name, GrKFInterpolator* interpolators, unsigned int interpolatorCount, float blendWeight, float speed )
00057 : GrAnim( name, blendWeight, speed )
00058 , _interpolators( 0 )
00059 , _interpolatorCount( interpolatorCount )
00060 , _duration( 0.0f )
00061 , _time( 0.0f )
00062 , _clamp( false )
00063 {
00064         _interpolators = new GrKFInterpolator[ interpolatorCount ];
00065         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00066                 _interpolators[ i ] = interpolators[ i ];
00067         CalcDuration();
00068 }

00081 //----------------------------------------------------------
00082 GrAnim*
00083 GrKFAnim::Clone() const
00084 {
00085         GrAnim* anim = new GrKFAnim( GetName(), _interpolators, _interpolatorCount, GetBlendWeight(), GetSpeed() );
00086         CloneChildren( anim );
00087         return anim;
00088 }

00090 //----------------------------------------------------------
00091 void
00092 GrKFAnim::Save( UWriter& writer )
00093 {
00095         writer.WriteUInt( *( ( unsigned int *)"KANM" ) );
00096         writer.WriteUInt( 0x00010000U );
00097 
00099         writer.WriteString( GetName() );
00100 
00102         writer.WriteFloat( _duration );
00103         writer.WriteInt( _clamp ? 1 : 0 );
00104 
00106         writer.WriteInt( _interpolatorCount );
00107 
00109         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00110                 _interpolators[ i ].GetKFData()->Save( writer );
00111 }
00112 
00113 void
00114 GrKFAnim::Load( UReader& reader )
00115 {
00116         Clean();
00117 
00119         unsigned int tag = reader.ReadUInt();
00120         unsigned int ver = reader.ReadUInt();
00121         B_ASSERT( tag == *( ( unsigned int *)"KANM" ) );
00122         B_ASSERT( ver == 0x00010000U );
00123 
00125         SetName( reader.ReadString() );
00126 
00128         _duration = reader.ReadFloat();
00129         _clamp = ( reader.ReadInt() != 0 );
00130 
00132         _interpolatorCount = reader.ReadUInt();
00133         _interpolators = new GrKFInterpolator[ _interpolatorCount ];
00134 
00136         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00137                 _interpolators[ i ].Init( new GrKFAnimData( reader ) );
00138 }

00141 //==========================================================
00143 //==========================================================

00145 //----------------------------------------------------------
00146 void
00147 GrKFAnim::CalcDuration()
00148 {
00149         _duration = 0.0f;
00150         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00151                 _duration = Max( _interpolators[ i ].GetKFData()->GetDuration(), _duration );
00152 }
00153 
00154 //----------------------------------------------------------
00155 void
00156 GrKFAnim::OnApplyPose( float timeAdvance, float blendWeight )
00157 {
00158         if ( _duration > 0 )
00159         {
00160                 if ( _clamp )
00161                 {
00162                         _time = _duration;
00163                 }
00164                 else
00165                 {
00166                         _time = Fract( _time / _duration ) * _duration;
00167                         _time += timeAdvance;
00168                 }
00169         }
00170 
00172         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00173                 _interpolators[ i ].ApplyPose( _time, blendWeight, _duration, _clamp );
00174 }
00175 
00176 //----------------------------------------------------------
00177 void
00178 GrKFAnim::OnPlayerChange( GrAnimPlayer* player )
00179 {
00180         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _interpolatorCount; ++i )
00181                 _interpolators[ i ].SetOutput( player != 0 ? &player->GetTransformCache() : 0 );
00182 }
00183 
00184 //----------------------------------------------------------
00185 void
00186 GrKFAnim::OnSeekTo( float time )
00187 {
00188         _time = time;
00189 }
00190 
00191 //----------------------------------------------------------
00192 float
00193 GrKFAnim::OnGetDuration()
00194 {
00195         return _duration;
00196 }
00197 
00198 //----------------------------------------------------------
00199 void
00200 GrKFAnim::Clean()
00201 {
00202         delete[] _interpolators;
00203 }
